Text: Thank you! I was waiting for a small 720p version of this flick!!!!

@YIFY: Are you Arabic..? "Yify" sounds kind of Middle Eastern. Anyway, how about exporting things at resolution of 720x or 640x..? That's much more watchable for everyone who doesn't have a quad-core Pentium-X. Plus, you can make them smaller then , e.g. 350-400MB. Thanx.

Glad to see your back T.P.B

Decent movie, Cage always does a decent job killing 1:40
